name.baseName: 土壤修复;异位修复;水泥窑协同处置;运行阶段;熟料煅烧

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: This cement plant operates a modern dry-process production line with a capacity of 4000 tons per day, annually producing 1.9 million tons of cement and 1.5 million tons of clinker. The plant has an owned mining area of 0.448 square kilometers with an annual limestone production capability of 2 million tons. The production process involves advanced RSP five-stage precalciner technology. Hazardous wastes are transported by trucks using specialized vehicles on a dedicated freight route. Transport distance from the mine to the factory is approximately 1.5 km, and waste transportation distance is about 50 km. The inclusion of the waste disposal step allows waste materials (contaminated soil, digested sludge, waste oil sludge, etc.) to be utilized as alternative raw materials and fuels, conserving limestone and coal resources. The cooperation of cement kilns during the operation stage in the clinker production process, primarily involving material preheating, decomposition, and clinkering in the rotary kiln, is accompanied by emissions of CO2 and other waste gases.

水泥厂拥有一条4000t/d规模的现代化干法生产线，年生产水泥190万t，熟料150万t．公司自有矿山面积0.448km2，年生产石灰石能力200万t.生产工艺采用具有先进水平的RSP五级窑外分解技术．危险废物均采用汽车运输方式，配置危险品专用车辆，行车路线为货车专用线.矿山至厂区的运输距离约1.5km，废弃物的运输距离约50km．常规水泥的生产过程主要包括原辅材料的幵采及运输、生料制备、煤粉制备、熟料煅烧和水泥粉磨等阶段， 添加废弃物处置环节后， 废弃物（污染土壤、消化污泥、废油泥等）可以用作替代原料和替代燃料，以节省石灰石和煤炭等原材料。水泥窑协同处置，运行阶段，熟料煅烧过程，主要是物料预热分解以及在回转窑中的煅烧分解过程，伴有CO2等废气的排放。

technology.technologicalApplicability: This cement plant operates a modern dry-process production line with a capacity of 4000 tons per day, annually producing 1.9 million tons of cement and 1.5 million tons of clinker. The plant has an owned mining area of 0.448 square kilometers with an annual limestone production capability of 2 million tons. The production process involves advanced RSP five-stage precalciner technology. Hazardous wastes are transported by trucks using specialized vehicles on a dedicated freight route. Transport distance from the mine to the factory is approximately 1.5 km, and waste transportation distance is about 50 km. The inclusion of the waste disposal step allows waste materials (contaminated soil, digested sludge, waste oil sludge, etc.) to be utilized as alternative raw materials and fuels, conserving limestone and coal resources. The cooperation of cement kilns during the operation stage in the clinker production process, primarily involving material preheating, decomposition, and clinkering in the rotary kiln, is accompanied by emissions of CO2 and other waste gases.

该水泥厂拥有一条现代化干法生产线，日产量4000吨，年产水泥190万吨，熟料150万吨。拥有0.448平方公里的矿山，年产石灰石能力200万吨。生产过程采用先进的RSP五级预分解窑技术。危险废物通过配置的专用车辆在货车专用线上运输。矿山至厂区运输距离约为1.5公里，废弃物运输距离约为50公里。随着废弃物处理步骤的加入，如污染土壤、消化污泥、废油泥等废弃物可作为替代原料和燃料使用，以节约石灰石和煤炭资源。水泥窑在运行阶段与熟料生产过程中合作，涉及物料预热、分解和回转窑中的煅烧过程，伴随着CO2等废气排放。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Data users should consider the inclusion of alternative raw materials and fuels from waste disposal in their LCA calculations to account for the material and energy savings. Specifically, for the hazardous waste transported and disposed of in the cement kiln process, accurate tracking of transport distances and the type of waste materials utilized as substitutes is critical. Users should also pay attention to the emissions generated during the clinker production stage, particularly CO2, and include them in the environmental impact assessment. It should also be noted that the transport of hazardous waste is subject to regulatory compliance and that the emission factors may vary depending on the waste composition and the efficiency of the decomposition process.
数据使用者在开展生命周期评估计算时，应考虑将废弃物处理中的替代原料和燃料纳入考虑，以此计入材料和能源节约。特别是对于水泥窑处置过程中运输和使用的危险废物，准确追踪运输距离和作为替代物的废弃物类型至关重要。使用者还应关注熟料生产阶段产生的排放，特别是CO2，并将其纳入环境影响评估。还应注意，危险废物的运输需遵守法规合规性，且排放因子可能会因废物组成和分解过程的效率而异。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
